entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
